synopsis: In this enlightening episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir explore the intricacies of work-life balance, sharing their personal journeys and struggles with burnout. They emphasize the importance of self-awareness and compassion, encouraging listeners to find fulfillment beyond societal expectations and to prioritize their mental health.
quotes: You deserve to feel whole and full at the end of the day, not worry about all the things you have to do tomorrow.
Work-life balance is about you; it's your life.
It's not about the number of hours you work, but the quality of life you live.
If you find yourself ignoring the people you love while scrolling through your phone, it's time to redefine your relationship with social media.
Every generation has its struggles, but we must keep moving forward to create a better future.
Sometimes, we need to let go of conventional ideas to truly find meaning in our lives.
The most creative mind is a bored mind; allow your brain the time to wander.
What would love have me do today?
You canâ€™t pour from an empty cup; take care of yourself first.
Life happens between the work hard and play hard.
